info.title: Notification Template
info.description: A set of API endpoints used by the inTandem platform to manage notification templates for various communication channels

Bearer.description: Provide a valid bearer token in the Authorization header. Example: 'Authorization: Bearer {token}'

get.description:
Get a list of NotificationTemplates

Available for **Staff Tokens**

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Max: 100

parameters.name: configurable_by_staff
parameters.description: Filter by whether the notification template is configurable by staff

post.description:
Create a new notification template

Available for **Staff Tokens**

configurable_by_staff.description: Whether this notification can be configured by a staff member and visible in the notification center

deep_link.description: Optional deep link URL for notification action
